00019 class Galleria_View_Pictures extends Galleria_Viewelement
00020 {
00021 
00031     public static function info($pics)
00032     {
00033         $text .= '<div id="pics">';
00034         foreach ($pics as $pic) {
00035             $text .= '<a href="' . self::$_http_url . 'images/?id=' . $pic->pid . '"><img src="' . self::$_http_url . 'images/file/?size=s&amp;id=' . $pic->pid . '" alt="' . ((strlen($pic->desc) > 20) ? htmlspecialchars(substr($pic->desc, 0, 17)) . '...' : $pic->desc) . '" ' . ((isset($pic->shown) && !$pic->shown) ? ' class="hidden"' : '') .'/></a>';
00036         }
00037         return $text . '</div>';
00038     }
00039 
00049     public static function format(Galleria_Image_Object $imgObj)
00050     {
00051         return '<img src="' . self::$_http_url . 'images/file/?id=' . $imgObj->getId() . '" alt="' . $imgObj->getAlt() . '" ' . (($imgObj->isShown()) ? '' : ' class="hidden"') .'/>';
00052     }
